means: 俯冲轰炸( dive-bomb的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Varied mission types: Ground attack, ground support, escort, defence, patrol, torpedo and dive - bombing.
sentence.Network_cn: 多种多样的任务类型: 地面攻击, 地面支援, 护航, 防卫, 巡逻, 鱼雷和俯冲轰炸.

sentence.Network_en: With a snarl, the second dog made a dive for his heel.
sentence.Network_cn: 伴着一声嗥叫，第二只狗扑向了他的脚后跟。

sentence.Network_en: She was standing by a pool, about to dive in.
sentence.Network_cn: 她站在水池旁边，正要往里跳。

list.abs: 狂派_百度百科 ... Razorclaw 利爪 Divebomb 大鹏（dive-bomb） Headstrong 铁头.
精华区 - 批踢踢实业坊 ... Razorclaw 锐爪 Divebomb 轰炸 Rampage 狂暴.
俯冲轰炸(Dive Bombing):耗1个行动点,在部队的下一次攻击中生效。此命令能够适度增加空军对敌地面部队的攻击力,并使其防御力也有所提升,适于在攻击有防空炮掩护.
steep dive 大角度俯冲steep dive bombing 大角度俯冲轰炸steep initial 大角度开始

entry.def: If a plane dive-bombs an area, it suddenly flies down low over it to drop bombs onto it.

example.ex: The Russians had to dive-bomb the cities to regain control.
example.tran: 俄国人必须俯冲轰炸那些城市才能重新获得控制权。

means.word_mean: 1. a bombing run in which the bomber release the bomb while flying straight toward the target

auth_sentence.content: We're afraid of the bombing and the shelling.
auth_sentence.res_content: We're afraid of the bombing and the shelling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We're afraid of the bombing and the shelling.

auth_sentence.content: One of the bombing suspects was in our hospital.
auth_sentence.res_content: One of the bombing suspects was in our hospital.

auth_sentence.content: Want to take a deeper dive into South Korea?
auth_sentence.res_content: Want to take a deeper dive into South Korea?
